news.title: Councils consider legal action over asylum hotels
news.summary: Nigel Farage says Reform UK-controlled councils will do everything in their power to close the hotels.

news.title: Kremlin plays down Zelensky talks as Trump warns Putin may not want to make deal
news.summary: The US president conceded the war in Ukraine was "tough to solve" after several days of high-level talks.

news.title: MND left her without a voice. Eight seconds of scratchy audio gave it back to her
news.summary: Sarah Ezekiel was 34 with two children when motor neurone disease took away her ability to speak.

news.title: Final Â£1 coins featuring late Queen enter circulation
news.summary: More than 23 million coins are being released, alongside 7.5 million new King Charles III coins.

news.title: UK independent space agency scrapped to cut costs
news.summary: Britain's space agency is set to be scrapped - a scientist fears the UK space sector could fall behind as a result

news.title: Leaked report shows 10,000 gap in probation staff
news.summary: There is a shortage of probation staff to manage offenders serving sentences in the community, a report shows.

news.title: More weight-loss drugs could be offered as part of new diabetes care
news.summary: Diabetes patients should have better and more equal access to newer medicines, says official healthcare body.

news.title: Jewellery, cash or first cars: Do rewards boost exam grades?
news.summary: Some parents offer money and gifts ahead of exams results - but does the promise of a reward work?

news.title: The Papers: 'Migrant hotels facing closure' and 'Noel: I'm so proud of Liam'
news.summary: The closure of a hotel housing migrants in Epping and the Gallagher brothers make Wednesday's papers.

news.title: Dozens of Afghan deportees from Iran killed in bus crash
news.summary: At least 17 children were among those killed after the bus crashed and caught fire on its way to Kabul.
